ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class ImageLineHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.pngdecoder.ImageLineHelper

  • public class ImageLineHelper
extends Object
    Bunch of utility static methods to proces an image line at the pixel level.

    WARNING: this has little testing/optimizing, and this API is not stable. some methods will probably be changed or removed if future releases.

    WARNING: most methods for getting/setting values work currently only for ImageLine or ImageLineByte

      • ImageLineHelper

    • Method Detail

      • scaleUp

        public static void scaleUp(IImageLineArray line)
        When the bitdepth is less than 8, the imageLine is usually returned/expected unscaled. This method upscales it in place. Eg, if bitdepth=1, values 0-1 will be converted to 0-255

      • scaleDown

        public static void scaleDown(IImageLineArray line)
        Reverse of scaleUp(IImageLineArray)

      • scaleUp

        public static byte scaleUp(int bitdepth,
           byte v)

      • scaleDown

        public static byte scaleDown(int bitdepth,
             byte v)

      • palette2rgb

        public static int[] palette2rgb(ImageLineInt line,
                PngChunkPLTE pal,
                PngChunkTRNS trns,
                int[] buf)
        Given an indexed line with a palette, unpacks as a RGB array, or RGBA if a non nul PngChunkTRNS chunk is passed
        Parameters:
        line - ImageLine as returned from PngReader
        pal - Palette chunk
        trns - Transparency chunk, can be null (absent)
        buf - Preallocated array, optional
        Returns:
        R G B (A), one sample 0-255 per array element. Ready for pngw.writeRowInt()

      • palette2rgba

        public static int[] palette2rgba(ImageLineInt line,
                 PngChunkPLTE pal,
                 PngChunkTRNS trns,
                 int[] buf)
        Same as palette2rgbx , but returns rgba always, even if trns is null
        Parameters:
        line - ImageLine as returned from PngReader
        pal - Palette chunk
        trns - Transparency chunk, can be null (absent)
        buf - Preallocated array, optional
        Returns:
        R G B (A), one sample 0-255 per array element. Ready for pngw.writeRowInt()

      • infoFirstLastPixels

        public static String infoFirstLastPixels(ImageLineInt line)
        Just for basic info or debugging. Shows values for first and last pixel. Does not include alpha

      • getPixelRGB8

        public static int getPixelRGB8(IImageLine line,
               int column)
